name: RADICAVA
indications: radicava radicava ors indicated treatment amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ( als ) .
contraindications: • radicava : recommended 60 mg administered intravenous infusion 60 minutes ( 2.1 ) • radicava ors : recommended 105 mg ( 5 ml ) taken orally via feeding tube morning overnight fasting . food consumed 1 hour except water ( 2.1 , 2.3 ) • radicava radicava ors : • initial treatment cycle : daily dosing 14 days followed 14- day drug-free period ( 2.1 ) • subsequent treatment cycles : daily dosing 10 days 14- day periods , followed 14-day drug-free periods ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: radicava radicava supplied 30 mg/100 ml ( 0.3 mg/ml ) clear , colorless , sterile solution intravenous infusion single-dose polypropylene bags , overwrapped polyvinyl alcohol ( pva ) secondary packaging containing oxygen absorber oxygen indicator , pink reflect appropriate oxygen levels [ ( 2.2 ) supplied/storage handling ( 16.2 ) ] . supplied cartons listed . ndc 70510-2171-1 30 mg/100 ml ( 0.3 mg/ml ) single-dose bag ndc 70510-2171-2 2 bags per carton radicava ors radicava ors supplied white off-white suspension multi-dose child resistant 60 ml amber glass bottle supplied two configurations : •radicava ors starter kit ( 14-day treatment cycle ) , including two ( 2 ) inner cartons , containing one ( 1 ) bottle 735 mg/35ml ( 105 mg/5 ml dose ) , two oral dosing syringes one bottle adapter . •radicava ors kit ( 10-day treatment cycle ) , including one ( 1 ) bottle 1050 mg/50 ml ( 105 mg/5 ml dose ) two oral dosing syringes one bottle adapter . supplied cartons listed : unit sale ndc number package configuration radicava ors starter kit ndc 70510-2321-1 carton one ( 1 ) bottle 35ml ( 105 mg/5 ml dose ) ndc 70510-2321-2 carton two ( 2 ) ndc 70510-2321-1 radicava ors kit ndc 70510-2322-1 carton one ( 1 ) bottle 50 ml ( 105 mg/5 ml dose )
adverseReactions: radicava radicava ors contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity edaravone inactive ingredients product . hypersensitivity anaphylactic occurred [ ( 5.1 , 5.2 ) ] .
indications_original: RADICAVA and RADICAVA ORS are indicated for the treatment of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).
contraindications_original: • RADICAVA:  The recommended dosage is 60 mg administered as an intravenous infusion over 60 minutes ( 2.1 ) • RADICAVA ORS: The recommended dosage is 105 mg (5 mL) taken orally or via feeding tube in the morning after overnight fasting.  Food should not be consumed for 1 hour after administration except water ( 2.1 , 2.3 ) • For RADICAVA and RADICAVA ORS: • Initial treatment cycle: daily dosing for 14 days followed by a 14- day drug-free period ( 2.1 ) • Subsequent treatment cycles: daily dosing for 10 days out of 14- day periods, followed by 14-day drug-free periods ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
RADICAVA
                        
                        RADICAVA is supplied as a 30 mg/100 mL (0.3 mg/mL) clear, colorless, sterile solution for intravenous  infusion in single-dose polypropylene bags, each overwrapped with polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) secondary packaging containing an oxygen absorber and oxygen indicator, which should be pink to reflect appropriate oxygen levels [see 
                           
                              Dosage and
                           
                           
                              Administration (2.2)
                           
                           and 
                           
                              How Supplied/Storage and Handling (16.2)
                           
                           ]. These are  supplied in cartons as listed below.
                        NDC 70510-2171-1 30 mg/100 mL (0.3 mg/mL) single-dose bag
                        NDC 70510-2171-2 2 bags per carton
                        
                           RADICAVA ORS
                        
                        RADICAVA ORS is supplied in a white to off-white suspension in multi-dose child resistant 60 mL amber glass bottle which is supplied as two configurations: 
                        
                           
                              •RADICAVA ORS Starter Kit (14-day treatment cycle), including two (2) inner cartons, each containing one (1) bottle of 735 mg/35mL (105 mg/5 mL dose), two oral dosing syringes and one bottle adapter.
                           
                              •RADICAVA ORS Kit (10-day treatment cycle), including one (1) bottle of 1050 mg/50 mL (105 mg/5 mL dose) with two oral dosing syringes and one bottle adapter.
                        
                        These are supplied in cartons as listed below:
                        
                           
                           
                           
                           
                              
                                 
                                    
                                       Unit of sale
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       NDC number
                                    
                                 
                                 
                                    
                                       Package configuration
                                    
                                 
                              
                              
                                 
                                    RADICAVA ORS Starter Kit
                                 
                                 
                                    NDC 70510-2321-1
                                 
                                 
                                    Carton of One (1) bottle of 35mL (105 mg/5 mL dose)
                                 
                              
                              
                                 
                                    NDC 70510-2321-2
                                 
                                 
                                    Carton of two (2) NDC 70510-2321-1 
                                 
                              
                              
                                 
                                    RADICAVA ORS Kit
                                 
                                 
                                    NDC 70510-2322-1
                                 
                                 
                                    Carton of One (1) bottle of 50 mL (105 mg/5 mL dose)
adverseReactions_original:
RADICAVA and RADICAVA ORS are contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to edaravone or any of the inactive ingredients in this product. Hypersensitivity reactions and anaphylactic reactions have occurred [see 
                     
                        
                           Warnings and Precautions (5.1
                        , 
                           5.2
                        )].
